title: Listen to Young Dread for Free On Spotify.com
text:
Thursday, September 28, 2017 23:14
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
Music with Dread’s Unique Style, Energy, Raw and Uncensored Rap
29th September 2017 – Young Dread is a name that needs no introduction in the music industry. A popular International Recording Artist by profession, Young Dread is also a multi-talented artist, actor and a model too. Dread composes his own music and lyrics and works with some of the most successful producers in the industry. Young Dread completed his High School education in Dreher High School, Columbia in South Carolina. He graduated in 2000 with honors and was ranked amongst the top 10% to have achieved full academic scholarship into the Fisk University. In 2004 he graduated from the School of Audio Engineer, Nashville as a Bachelor of Arts. He has also undergone dance training from DeeCrump, Ebony Dance School and the Summer Institute for Arts & Dance by University of South Carolina.
Young Dread’s passion for music has made him what he is today. With more than 200 famous songs to his credit, he has over 70,000 listeners on Spotify. And the number keeps increasing every day. Dread has already performed in over 64 venues during his local and international tours. He is now a proud owner of a recording studio based at Atlanta. He also provides various opportunities for indie artists and upcoming artists to share their beats, lyrics and music. He is also a successful entrepreneur and his success started when he signed an international publishing deal with the largest interactive entertainment network, TouchTunes in May 2008.
This publishing deal helped him get more and more fan base from different corners of the world. Young Dread now has over 85 general managers and program directors from different radio stations located internationally and featuring his music in different stations. During this time he has also created a unique relationship with the DJs at various radio stations. Young Dread’s music is now available on different sites such as Amazon, Shockhound, iTunes, Rhapsody, eMusic, Jamster, LaLa, CMT, Napster, VH1, MTV Mobile, AT & T, LimeWire, Thumbplay, IMVU and more. The artist who is known for his raw, unique, uncensored, interesting visceral rap captures thousands of hearts every day.
To listen to Young Dread visit https://open.spotify.com/artist/6bUtVxyehq47Z5syMLefH5
About Spotify.com
Spotify, www.spotify.com is a digital music service that allows users to have on-demand access to more than 20 million tracks. This award winning music service company helps users discover their favorite albums, manage as well as share their music with friends.
